title: MiningHub PDF: Hindi localization + crypto mining explainer section

requirements.summary: Localize the generated MiningHub investment plan PDF content to Hindi (all headings, labels, paragraphs, and footer strings) while keeping the existing layout stable.
acceptanceCriteria: Generating and downloading the PDF produces a document where all section titles and descriptive text are in Hindi (numbers/currency values may remain numeric like $20, $0.60).
No English-only headings remain in the PDF (e.g., 'About MiningHub', 'Investment Package', 'Referral System', 'Generated from MiningHub Investment Plan').
The PDF generation completes successfully with the existing layout and does not throw runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Translate all user-visible plan copy used by the PDF into Hindi (tagline, description, services, benefits, deposit/withdrawal strings, etc.), and introduce a single-source-of-truth Hindi copy object for PDF section titles/labels/footer text so the PDF generator does not hardcode English strings.

Update PDF generation to exclusively use the centralized Hindi copy from frontend/src/content/mininghubPlan.ts for all headings/labels/paragraphs/footer strings (remove remaining hardcoded English strings), preserving existing styling, spacing, and page-break behavior.

requirements.summary: Add a dedicated Hindi section in the PDF that explains what crypto mining is and how it works, sourced from centralized plan content and respecting page breaks.
acceptanceCriteria: The generated PDF includes a clearly labeled Hindi section explaining (1) what crypto mining is and (2) how it works at a high level (e.g., verification/consensus, hashing, rewards), written as readable paragraphs and/or bullet points.
The new section is included in the PDF consistently on every generation and respects page-break handling (no overlapping text; it flows onto a new page if needed).
The new sectionâ€™s Hindi content is maintained as part of the single source of truth plan content (not scattered hard-coded across multiple components).

file_operations.description: Add a new Hindi crypto-mining explainer section to the plan content as the single source of truth (e.g., section title + paragraph text and/or bullet points describing what mining is and how it works).

Insert rendering for the new crypto mining explainer section as its own clearly titled section in the PDF, using the centralized Hindi content and the existing page-break helper to ensure clean flow across pages.
